item.title: IGS Classic Arcade Collection coming to PC in 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/igs-classic-arcade-collection-coming-to-pc-in-2025

  • PC

Eight classic titles developed by International Game Systems.

H2 Interactive will release IGS Classic Arcade Collection for PC via Steam in 2025, the publisher announced.

IGS Classic Arcade Collection, which includes eight classic games developed by International Game Systems, first launched for Switch on April 13, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via H2 Interactive:

About

IGS Classic Arcade Collection brings back eight beloved International Game Systems arcade games to Steam for the first time!

Relive the excitement of classic arcade action with up to four-player online cooperative play for select titles. Whether you’re a longtime fan or discovering these games for the first time, this collection is packed with nostalgic fun!

This collection includes multiple games from the Knights of Valour series, complete with online multiplayer cooperative support. It also includes popular arcade favorites such as Oriental Legend and Martial Masters.

Included Games

  • Knights of Valour: Super Heroes
  • Knights of Valour Plus
  • Knights of Valour 2: Nine Dragons
  • Oriental Legend
  • Oriental Legend Spooky
  • Martial Masters
  • Demon Front
  • The Gladiator

Key Features

  • Authentic Arcade Experience
    • The original game content has been completely preserved, and the fun experienced on the arcade machine has been reproduced!
    • The arcade style display perfectly captures the atmosphere of those days!
  • Online Multiplayer Support
    • For select titles, unite with up to three other friends or players online and conquer challenges together!
    • Pit your skills against players worldwide by competing for top scores on the leaderboards!
  • Indulge in Modern Conveniences
    • The games in this collection include difficulty options, allowing even novices to quickly get started.
    • You can also utilize the save/load anywhere function, letting players revisit challenges anytime.
    • For those who master the games, push your limits by challenging the highest difficulty!

item.title: Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter details tactical orbments
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/trails-in-the-sky-1st-chapter-details-tactical-orbments

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Endless strategies for quartz customization.

Falcom has updated the official website for Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter with new information, gameplay, and screenshots introducing the game’s tactical orbments.

Get the details below.

Endless Strategies for Quartz Customization! Tactical Orbments

In Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter, each character possesses a tactical orbment. By equipping crystal circuits known as quartz, the player can enhance a character’s stats and unlock various orbal arts.

Keyword: Quartz

There are seven elements of quartz: Earth, Water, Fire, Wind, Time, Space, and Mirage.

When you insert quartz into a tactical orbment, the elemental values of all quartz within each engraved orbment line will be summed up separately.

Arts can be used when their elemental value requirements are met. Each art has its own elemental value requirements.

Customize Orbments Using “Auto-Equip” When Stuck!

You can utilize the “Auto-Equip” feature to easily customize your tactical orbment.

This feature automatically equips quartz based on your preferences, allowing you to choose between Balanced, Physical, and Speed-based builds.

Trails in the Sky 1st Chapter is due out for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam on September 19 worldwide. Read more about the game here, here, and here.

item.title: Firmament for PS5, PS VR2, and PS4 launches July 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/firmament-for-ps5-ps-vr2-and-ps4-launches-july-2

  • PS VR2
  • PS4
  • PS5

Explore three Realms with complex environmental puzzles.

Cyan will release puzzle adventure game Firmament for PlayStation 5 with PlayStation VR2 support, and PlayStation 4 on July 2, the developer announced.

Firmament first launched for PC via Steam and GOG on May 18, 2023.

Here is an overview of the game, via Cyan:

About

Firmament is a new puzzle adventure game by the legendary game studio behind the best-selling games Myst and Riven. Featuring deep storytelling and world-building, discover the story of this seemingly abandoned world as you explore and unlock the mysteries of three unique Realms… and beyond!

Key Features

  • Explore the World – Featuring a unique steampunk aesthetic, Firmament invites you to explore the legendary deep world-building Cyan Worlds is known for. Firmament is a fantastic visual feast, with thrilling new sights to see around every corner. At the same time, the world of Firmament feels completely plausible; as though it were constructed with a bigger purpose in mind… A purpose you will be compelled to discover as you play.
  • Solve the Puzzles – You carry with you a device called an “Adjunct” as you explore. This Adjunct is your interface as you interact with the various devices throughout the Realms of Firmament. Employing the Adjunct to solve the puzzles you encounter will bring you ever closer to unlocking the secrets this place holds.
  • Discover the Story – You are not entirely alone in Firmament. In addition to The Adjunct, you are joined by a mysterious apparition, who has a story of her own to share with you. As you explore you will be introduced to three Realms—each with secrets and mysteries to reveal. What purpose do the Realms serve? Can the spirit who accompanies you be trusted?
  • Reveal the Mystery – Are the realms of Firmament abandoned? What are these giant, mysterious machines scattered throughout the world? What is their purpose? What part do you play in this grand mystery? Explore, Discover, Solve, and Reveal the mystery for yourself by playing Firmament!

item.title: Capcom Spotlight set for June 26, featuring Resident Evil Requiem, PRAGMATA, and more
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/capcom-spotlight-set-for-june-26-featuring-resident-evil-requiem-pragmata-and-more

40 minutes of updates on upcoming Capcom titles.

Capcom will host a Capcom Spotlight broadcast on June 26 at 3:00 p.m. PT / 6:00 p.m. ET / June 27 at 7:00 JST, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube (English, Japanese).

The 40-minute broadcast will feature “the latest news on highly anticipated upcoming Capcom titles along with developer interviews,” including details on the newest update for Monster Hunter Wilds. Featured titles include Resident Evil Requiem, PRAGMATA, Monster Hunter Wilds, and Street Fighter 6.
